wikipedia_page.main: Charles Cospatrick Archibald Douglas-Home, 13th Earl of Home,  (29 December 1873 – 11 July 1951), styled Lord Dunglass between 1881 and 1918, was a British peer and banker. He served as Lord Lieutenant of Berwickshire from 1930 to 1951. He was the father of British prime minister, Sir Alec Douglas-Home.
